Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

It's the weaker and shorter of the Half-Life 2 episodes but still a blast to play. It has a stronger focus on coop gameplay with a companion IA, and in my view that ruins a bit the solo aspect that was so important on the original Half-Life games, but it's well implemented.

Pretty good expansion pack to Half Life 2. Gameplay is fun, expansion of the story is interesting, puzzles are good but sometimes really difficult. It is too short and the beginning is too slow. Overall, really good expansion.

7/10

one free bullet is actually very easy

The inferior game between the two episodes, but still a blast!

Yes, it's very short. It took me 3.5 hours to complete it. At the same time, EP1 is polished as hell. Not having any weapons other than the Gravity Gun, in the beginning, freaked me out a bit, but I got through the first chapter and soon I had my weapons again.

Getting the crowbar back actually got me teary. That's an insane achievement for an FPS. I emoted loudly, drawing my wife's attention. I couldn't believe how much I missed it :)

Graphics got a nice bump in EP1. Everything looks sharper and more detailed. Lighting was improved as well -- it definitely felt more natural. I'm still amazed at what Source can achieve.

In short, EP1 was over too soon, whetting my appetite for Episode 2. If you own the Orange Box (one of the best values in gaming, ever) prepare to be amazed.

Continuación del excelente juego HL2

El mundo esta hecho un desastre, portales, hombres cangrejos, hormigas gigantes, zancudos mecanicos, mutantes, invasion alienigena, y para completar ahora hay ZOMBIES.  Morgan Freeman y Alyx seran los encargados  de hacerle frente La Alianza y a Thanos e intentar sacar a la Humanidad  de la situación en la que está metida. 

Este duo es mejor que batman y robin. jajjaja  Y q no se nos olvide D0G.  Esto si es un dog,  no como el q tengo yo en casa que lo unico q hace es comer y botar pelos por todos lados.


A tomar en cuenta:

▶ Nuevamente esto es un gran juego. No te dejes llevar por la fecha.
▶ Gran jugabilidad.
▶ Full Español.
▶ Aun esperando HL3

This is the worst part of half life 2. You can skip this one.
Episode 1 hikaye olarak çok beğendiğim Gordon ve Alxy 'nin arasında bişey olabilir mi acabayı daha çok düşünmemi sağlamıştı. Mermi kullanmadan oyun bitir başarımı da oldukça heyecanlı oluyor.
it really portrays the companionship you have with Alyx
Good follow-up to the Half-Life 2 story, while rather short this game. It's worth it.

A short continuation of Half-Life 2. This game was a little disappointing to play after playing the amazing Half-Life 2 and I had high hopes for this one. Unfortunately, it was okay nonetheless. If you're interested in what happens after the 2nd Half-Life, want more Half-Life, or you got it in the Orange Box, this game just might be for you. However, don't come into this game thinking it will be anything more exciting than Half-Life 2. The beginning, or be it the whole 4 hours, is a bit slowly paced and annoying trying to move onto the next chapter and having to get out of being trapped/pushed by Alex. She showed emotion in this one, but not really anything you want. She would stop during the mission because she's trying to cope with the crap that just went down, which is normal, but it makes her seem more sensitive than what she was before and slows down the entire mission. Other than that, it's just more Half-Life that I can't say I regret playing or even enjoying at certain parts. I don't want to spoil much in case you're interested in trying this game, so I'm just gonna say it has all the animation, sound effects, and graphics as the game before it but it just lacks some charm and polish.

Controls and mechanics are still the same as of Half-Life 2. This is a short additional push of the narrative which is interesting but just like previous games, the plot is missing the hook. The world is great but I felt it was missing details that drive home the "greatness" that is this series. Great fun with fun set pieces.
Played on Mouse and Keyboard with no mods.
An expansion to an already great game; with new combat scenarios and other new things, this game was definitely needed after HL2's ending.
Si quieres explorar los potenciales del motor gráfico Source junto con Gordon Freeman, este episodio es excelente. Recomendado.

Данный эпизод достаточно скучный по сравнению со вторым, но для понимания сюжета он важен. Алекс у меня вызывает не сопереживание, а чувство НЕНАВИСТИ к ней, да и шутки у неё в этом эпизоде...такие себе. В общем, если хотите пройти hl2ep2, вам придётся взять этот эпизод-но можно в принципе и в Orange box'e получить в комплекте с остальными hl2-что будет явно дешевле и удобнее.

People still wishing for HL3 should replay this game to refresh their memories.  This old level design is not good.  Maybe when released it was cutting edge.  Modern times it's a big pass.  You spend most of game waiting for NPC to move around and do things before you can progress.   It is so slow to be painful. No skip options so you're constantly waiting around thinking 'can I play now please?'.
It seems the game wants the immortal NPC with infinite ammo to kill everything while you just escort and knock things over.  Difficulty in this game is to spawn enemies behind or on top of you. Then once you've worked out the gimmick to clear the area, you then play spot the object to progress, assuming the NPC didn't bug out and is still following. Oh and the game has that  mechanic no-one misses of auto-saving when you have low health, so if you do die, you have to do the whole next section perfectly or go way back to your non-existent earlier manual save and repeat all those same dialogues and big pauses without gameplay again.
Maybe I'm old now.  I remember original HL2 was better than this.  At least then you got to play the game.  This is a prolonged escort mission with some annoying level design along the way.   It's not fun.
